title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 03 September 2013 - XWiki
content:
<Denis> has quit  
00:58 <vmassol> has quit  
04:30 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
05:51 <Denis> has quit  
05:58 <sdumitriu> has quit  
05:59 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
06:45 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
07:17 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
07:29 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
07:53 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:59 <evalica> has quit  
07:59 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:04 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
08:27 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:46 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
08:49 <polx> has quit  
09:00 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:13 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
09:21 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: good morning  
09:21 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: what PR should I start reviewing?  
09:21 <gdelhumeau> hi vmassol  
09:22 <gdelhumeau> You can follow the order of the subtasks: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9340  
09:23 <vmassol> ok  
09:25 <polx> has quit  
09:28 <vmassol> Denis: Good morning. I'd be curious to know your opinion about my comment here: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/143#issuecomment-23694304  
09:38 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
09:38 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: ok I'm done with https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/143  
09:38 <vmassol> I've left a few comments  
09:39 <vmassol> seems good in general, a few small details to improve  
09:39 <Denis> vmassol: I am commenting...  
09:39 <vmassol> thanks Denis  
09:42 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:59 <Denis> vmassol: commented  
09:59 <gdelhumeau> Denis: thx  
10:05 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: commented on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9409?focusedCommentId=77157&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-77157 too  
10:05 <gdelhumeau> ok  
10:05 <gdelhumeau> I'm answering  
10:20 <tdelafosse> has joined #xwiki  
10:22 <vmassol> sburjan/msmeria: good morning  
10:22 <vmassol> do you think you guys could document the autosave feature on http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/PageEditing ? Some screenshots there don't even show it  
10:23 <vmassol> you could move the "as a wiki user" section of http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/Autosave to http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/PageEditing since the devguide should only be about dev and not usage (you could replace with a link)  
10:23 <vmassol> wdyt?  
10:25 <msmeria> vmassol: good morning  
10:25 <msmeria> I could do it  
10:27 <vmassol> msmeria: thanks!  
10:27 <msmeria> no problem  
10:37 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <camil7> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <vmassol> mflorea: back? :)  
10:47 <mflorea> yes :)  
10:47 <vmassol> welcome back then!  
10:47 <mflorea> thanks :)  
11:09 <vmassol> msmeria: still editing?  
11:09 <msmeria> vmassol: yes  
11:09 <vmassol> ok let me know when you're done  
11:09 <msmeria> sure  
11:11 <msmeria> vmassol: done  
11:15 <vmassol> thanks msmeria!  
11:16 <msmeria> vmassol: you're welcome  
11:39 <kstuart> has quit  
11:42 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
11:44 <polx> has quit  
11:44 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
11:46 <kstuart> has joined #xwiki  
12:06 <polx> has quit  
12:15 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
12:21 <polx> has quit  
12:25 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
12:49 <gdelhumeau> I have proposed to add "MultiWikis" section in the Administration, but Fabio & Sergui think it is a weird name  
12:49 <gdelhumeau> Fabio propose "Multi-wiki" or "Multiple wikis"  
12:49 <gdelhumeau> Do you have any suggestion? Should I ask on the ML?  
12:54 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
12:54 <Denis> has quit  
12:58 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: if you could create the documentation for XWIKI-9405 then I could close it :)  
13:02 <vmassol> mflorea: don't forget XWIKI-9392 it's one of the most important issues for 5.2 :)  
13:03 <vmassol> guys, we're really in a bad shape so far for 5.2  
13:03 <vmassol> we have only 3 more days for 5.2M2  
13:03 <vmassol> and on the roadmap page almost nothing is closed  
13:04 <mflorea> vmassol: I've started working on it before my holidays  
13:04 <vmassol> ok, can it be in M2?  
13:04 <vmassol> (I hope)  
13:06 <mflorea> yes  
13:06 <vmassol> ok cool  
13:11 <polx> has quit  
13:16 <mflorea> has quit  
13:52 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
13:56 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: I don't know if you've seen my comment at https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/pull/39/ ?  
13:59 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:01 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: Yes, I'm gonna work on it  
14:02 <vmassol> ok  
14:04 <gdelhumeau> also on the documentation for XWIKI-9405  
14:06 <vmassol> ok  
14:07 <polx> has quit  
14:08 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
14:10 <polx> has quit  
14:14 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
14:15 <sburjan> vmassol: sent also to the user lists  
14:17 <vmassol> ok  
14:17 <vmassol> now you have 2 threads to handle :)  
14:17 <vmassol> (and merge)  
14:18 <vmassol> should be ok, there probably won't be many answers anyway  
14:19 <sburjan> :)  
14:30 <Denis1> has quit  
15:17 <evalica> has quit  
15:22 <polx> has quit  
15:32 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
15:55 <msmeria> has quit  
16:02 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:18 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
16:20 <polx> has quit  
16:22 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:24 <sdumitriu1> has quit  
16:28 <sburjan> has quit  
16:41 <polx> has quit  
17:06 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
17:17 <gdelhumeau> I need a place to write the documentation for XWIKI-9405  
17:17 <gdelhumeau> Where should I put it?  
17:18 <gdelhumeau> As a new extension?  
17:18 <vmassol> nope  
17:18 <vmassol> you committed this in the security module  
17:18 <vmassol> right?  
17:18 <gdelhumeau> right  
17:18 <vmassol> so you should document it there  
17:18 <vmassol> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Security+Module  
17:18 <vmassol> (if need be)  
17:18 <gdelhumeau> can't be there: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Access+Rights ?  
17:19 <vmassol> indeed there's a table there  
17:19 <vmassol> "Default rights being predefined  
17:19 <vmassol> "  
17:19 <vmassol> now  
17:19 <vmassol> you're right  
17:20 <vmassol> seems Denis added documentation for the new security module but he didn't merge with the old doc  
17:21 <vmassol> so we need to decide how we're going to avoid duplication in the future  
17:21 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
17:21 <vmassol> so you can either: update http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Access+Rights or refactor  
17:23 <vmassol> ideally we would have only 1 place for the rights doc and this place should be the new security module  
17:23 <vmassol> FTR there's also http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/RightsManagement  
17:24 <gdelhumeau> The security module documentation seems too technical for regular users  
17:25 <gdelhumeau> it talks about the API  
17:28 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: yes but that's not meant to be  
17:28 <vmassol> :)  
17:28 <vmassol> each module should have 3 sections  
17:28 <vmassol> - user guide  
17:28 <vmassol> - dev guide  
17:28 <vmassol> - admin guide  
17:29 <vmassol> we need to talk more about this  
17:30 <vmassol> to make sure eveyrone knows and agrees, basically I need to send a proposal. I propbably sent one in the past but I don't remember ATM ;)  
17:30 <gdelhumeau> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9405 documented  
17:35 <vmassol> issue closed!  
17:39 <gdelhumeau> great ;)  
17:50 <mflorea> has quit  
17:50 <polx> has quit  
17:58 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
17:58 <gdelhumeau\_> has joined #xwiki
